AH.nav.info.item.limit.lore.de-DE:
[green][ROUNDDOT] Du hast aktuell [green][selled-items] / [yellow][limit] Items im Auktionshaus.

[grey][green][ARROW] Verkaufe Items mit /ah sell
AH.nav.info.item.limit.lore.en-US:
[green][ROUNDDOT] You currently have [green][selled-items] / [yellow][limit] items in the auction house.

[grey][green][ARROW] Sell items with /ah sell

AH.command.sell.error.limit.de-DE: [grey]Du hast das Limit von [red][limit]</color> Items im [green]Auktionshaus</color> erreicht. Bitte warte bis jemand Items [green]von dir kauft</color> oder [red]entferne</color> Items von dir wieder aus dem [green]Auktionshaus.</color></color>
AH.command.sell.error.limit.en-US: [grey]You have reached the limit of [red][limit]</color> items in the [green]Auction House</color>. Please wait until someone [green]buys your items</color> or [red]remove</color> items from the [green]Auction House.</color></color>

AH.command.sell.success.en-US: [grey]You have put [mint_green_light][amount]x</color> [mint_green_dark][item]</color> for [mint_green_dark]$[price]</color> in the [green]Auction House</color>!</color>
